greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Terms of A110142 at positions p(n)+1, where p(n) = A000041(n) is the number of partitions of n; a(n) = A110142(p(n)+1) for n>=1, with a(0) = 1.
xref: Cf. A110142, A110141, A000041, A000165 (double factorials).
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, Jul 14 2005
